video.title: Apocalypse 101
video.synopsis: As the owners of Forge Survival Supply, four former Marines make it their mission to teach doomsday preppers how to survive any scenario.

episodes.synopsis: Joel, Mark, Mike and Jimmy, owners of Forge Survival Supply, put a couple prepping in a remote Colorado town through their paces with an attack drill.
episodes.title: Expect the Unexpected

episodes.synopsis: At the Forge, Jimmy expands Tommy's knowledge of firearms, while Joel and Mike help a Vietnam vet prep his home.
episodes.title: Ready to Rumble

episodes.synopsis: Mark and Jimmy help two guys from New York find a safe evacuation route from the city of 8 million people in the event of a crisis.
episodes.title: The Warrior Spirit

episodes.synopsis: The guys at Forge help a mountain man who camps year-round in his truck and a mother of seven kids who wants a bunker.
episodes.title: Guns, Bunkers, and Grease

episodes.synopsis: Two preppers planning for nuclear assault teach Joel and Jimmy how to mine for gold, and a Texas man who fled Vietnam as a child stockpiles weapons.
episodes.title: Better Safe Than Sorry
